structure.unit: ARTICLE V. TOURIST DEVELOPMENT ROOM TAX

text.section:
Sec. 29-51.2. Tax Collector's powers and duties.
The Tax Collector shall maintain accurate books, records and accounts reflecting the collection, administration and disbursement of the taxes levied and imposed under this article. The Tax Collector shall prescribe and publish such forms as may be necessary to effectuate the local collection of the tourist development room tax, the professional sports franchise facility tax, the tourist development surtax and the homeless and spouse abuse tax. For the purpose of collecting the tourist development room tax, the professional sports franchise facility tax, the tourist development surtax and the homeless and spouse abuse tax, the Tax Collector shall have the same duties and powers as those vested in the Florida Department of Revenue under Chapter 212, Florida Statutes.
